bio:
Cinda Williams Chima writes fantasy for teens of all ages, including the Shattered Realms, Seven Realms, and Heir Chronicles series. Her critically acclaimed books have appeared on numerous state awards lists. She lives in North Carolina and is always working on her next novel.
 (Chima, "Children of Ragnarok", 2022)
name: Cinda Williams Chima
